page.title: About us
page.description: Buddies is all about making friends, exploring Buenos Aires, and having a great time together. We are here to help you feel at home and create memories you will never forget.

intro.intro: Buddies is a student organization from ITBA aimed at helping incoming students adapt to both the university and Buenos Aires. Each exchange student is paired with an Argentinian student from ITBA, their Buddy, to provide guidance and support during their stay.
points: Create lifelong friendships between local and international students.
Offer cultural events, city tours, and networking opportunities.
Help students adapt to life in Buenos Aires through personalized support.
intro.closing: The program provides both Argentinian and exchange students the opportunity to meet people from all over the world, fostering an environment of cultural exchange and mutual growth.

content.value: You can sign up for a Spanish course at ITBA that starts two weeks before the semester (additional cost).
Once the semester starts, you have two weeks to confirm your course choices and make changes if needed.
Once you're here: ITBA has three buildings, one in Microcentro and two in Parque Patricios.

value: Join student groups with events and activities.
CEITBA offers discounts and sports classes.
Palermo: trendy vibe, nightlife, parks, cafes.
Recoleta: elegant architecture and historic charm.
Belgrano: leafy residential area with dining options.
Subte: extensive subway system with frequent service.
Buses: cover almost every area, less regular than the Subte.
Trains: useful for trips outside the city (e.g. Tigre).

content.value: SUBE CARD: Required for public transport. Buy and top up at kiosks or metro stations. Register in the SUBE app to avoid higher fares.
Private transport options include Uber, Cabify, Didi, and BA Taxi.

value: Ezeiza (EZE): international airport, 35 km south of the city.
Aeroparque (AEP): domestic/regional flights, close to downtown.

content.value: Main airlines: Aerolineas Argentinas, JetSmart, FlyBondi.
